newsitem.title: UK: PRESS DIGEST - London Evening Standard - Jan 31.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - London Evening Standard - Jan 31.

text.p: Prepared for Reuters by The Broadcast Monitoring Company
BBC, ITV AND SKY LINK TO GIVE YOU 30 CHANNELS

A new era in TV broadcasting was unveiled today with a 300mn stg deal linking Carlton, Granada, the BBC and Sky in a commercial partnership to be submitted to the ITC. Under the new proposals for digital TV, viewers will be offered a "plug in and watch' package of 15 channels which would be available through a "black box' add on to existing televisions.
DTI PROBE INTO COOK SHARE DEALS

The 80 million stg takeover of Sheffield based castings company William Cook faces further controversy today as it emerged that the Department of Trade and Industry has been called upon to investigate dealings at the firm.
SCOTTISH SHRUGS OFF OVERTURE FROM ABBEY
Scottish Amicable has rebuffed a takeover bid from Abbey National, calling the group's bid to pay 400 million stg to Amicable's 1.1 million policyholders as "superficial and ill-timed'.
SAINSBURY AND SBC FEELING THE STRAIN
Retail giant Sainsbury's relations with its merchant bank SBC Warburg are strained and it is unclear as to how long the partnership will continue.
NURSING NEW HOMES FOR VENTURE CAPITAL

Venture Capital Trusts are to be launched for investment in nursing homes and other property backed businesses. Next week Downing will announce a new 25 million stg VCT bigger than all but one of the existing VCTs.
